authors.author: Edwin O. Excell Rev. Johnson Jr. Oatman

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Count your blessings newline Name them one by one. newline Count your blessings newline See what God hath done. newline Count your blessings newline Name them one by one. newline Count your many blessings newline See what God hath done.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: When upon life's billows newline You are tempest tossed, newline When you are discouraged newline Thinking all is lost, newline Count your many blessings newline Name them one by one, newline And it will surprise you newline What the Lord hath done.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Are you ever burdened newline With a load of care, newline Does the cross seem heavy newline You are called to bear. newline Count your many blessings newline Every doubt will fly, newline And you will be singing newline As the days go by.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: When you look at others newline With their lands and gold, newline Think that Christ has promised newline You His wealth untold. newline Count your many blessings newline Money cannot buy, newline Your reward in heaven newline Nor your home on high.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: So amid the conflict newline Whether great or small, newline Do not be discouraged newline God is over all. newline Count your many blessings newline Angels will attend, newline Help and comfort give you newline To your journey's end.
